contentList.content: Your devotion empowers your healing spells. When successfully healing a creature with a healing spell or <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Shout_AuraOfVitality">Restore Vitality</LSTag>, it regains additional[1] equal to 2 + the spell's level.

Healing others heals you as well.

When casting a healing spell on another creature, you regain[1] equal to 2 + the spell's level.
When you roll[1] or[2], you can use your <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="ChannelDivinity">Channel Divinity</LSTag> to deal maximum damage instead.
Once per turn, deal [1] in addition to your melee weapon's [2], or your ranged weapon's [3] when you make a <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Weapon Attack</LSTag>.
Once per turn, deal [1], [4], or [5] in addition to your melee weapon's [2], or your ranged weapon's [3] when you make a <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Weapon Attack</LSTag>.
Once per turn, deal [1], in addition to your melee weapon's [2], or [3] in addition to your ranged weapon's [4] when you make a <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Weapon Attack</LSTag>.
Once per turn, deal [1] in addition to your weapon's [2] when you make a <LSTag Tooltip="MeleeWeaponAttack">Melee Weapon Attack</LSTag>.
Once per turn, deal [1] in addition to your weapon's [2] when you make a <LSTag Tooltip="RangedWeaponAttack">Ranged Weapon Attack</LSTag>.
At Cleric level 14, the additional damage increases to [1].
At Cleric level 14, the additional damage increases to [1] or [2].
At Cleric level 14, the additional damage increases to [1], [2] or [3].
Deal an additional [1] with your <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Weapon Attack</LSTag>.

You gain the ability to infuse your weapon strikes with divine energy.

Once per turn, deal [1], [4], or [5] in addition to your melee weapon's [2], or your ranged weapon's [3] when you make a Weapon Attack.

You gain the ability to infuse your weapon strikes with divine energy.

Once per turn, deal [1] in addition to your melee weapon's [2], or your ranged weapon's [3] when you make a Weapon Attack.

You gain the ability to infuse your weapon strikes with divine energy.

Once per turn, deal [1], in addition to your melee weapon's [2], or [3] in addition to your ranged weapon's [4] when you make a Weapon Attack.

You are blessed with divine might in battle.

Once per turn, when a creature takes damage from one of your Cantrips or Weapon Attacks, you can also deal [1] to that creature.
Channel your divine might through a <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Weapon Attack</LSTag> against a creature, dealing an additional [1].
Channel your divine might through a <LSTag Tooltip="MeleeWeaponAttack">Melee Weapon Attack</LSTag> against a creature, dealing an additional [1].
Channel your divine might through a <LSTag Tooltip="RangedWeaponAttack">Ranged Weapon Attack</LSTag> against a creature, dealing an additional [1].
Deal an additional [1] with your <LSTag Tooltip="Cantrip">Cantrip</LSTag> or <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Weapon Attack</LSTag>.
Does not consume a Divine Strike charge.
